entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
